name: Spyro Orange: The Cortex Conspiracy
description:
Spyro Orange: The Cortex Conspiracy is a casual action game developed by Vicarious Visions. It was originally released in 2004. Vivendi Games published the game. Spyro Orange: The Cortex Conspiracy has a Metascore of 60, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Spyro Orange: The Cortex Conspiracy is available on Game Boy Advance.
Caroline Trujillo produced the game. Manfred Linzer and Shin'en Multimedia scored the game.
